Nova Barlowè¯ºç“¦Â·å·´æ´›


A part-time project spanning over two years (and still going), this city by Jason features an extensive range of buildings, including a library, houses, baths, a palace, an arboretum, and a tavern. Designed to impress visitors at night, this extensive build would likely take days to explore completely at any time of day. Thanks for sharing it with us!
